$values.Name: Introduction

Eddie learns about the Bobby Flay competition. And then does some other stuff, and then eats pancakes! And the pancakes are delicious, but you already know that. I don't think anyone needs to be convinced about how staggeringly incredible pancakes are.
Eddie's dad disapproves of the Bobby Flay competition

Eddie's dad helps him crack eggs at the competition
Eddie improves at cooking
